tech_news.title: Apple’s cheapest iPad is already $70 off for Black Friday - The Verge
tech_news.description: Apple’s 11th-gen iPad is down to a record low price of $279 ($70 off) for Black Friday. The latest iPad Pro and iPad Air are also on sale.

tech_news.title: SpaceX’s upgraded Starship suffers explosion during testing - TechCrunch
tech_news.description: It may not have been a massive fireball, but SpaceX now has more work to do before it can kick off this next-generation version of Starship.

tech_news.title: PlayStation's 2025 Black Friday Sale is Live: $100 Off PS5 Consoles, 33% Off PS Plus, and More - IGN
tech_news.description: PlayStation's official Black Friday 2025 sale is now live across all retailers. From Nov. 21 to Dec. 1, you can save $100 off PS5 consoles, $20 off DualSense Controllers, 33% off PS Plus, and more.
